item.title: These Are My People
item.description: When I went to Seattle for BibleTech 2015, I expected to put a nice mark on my résumé and learn some interesting things. I came out with something much, much more valuable.
item.dc:creator: Chris Krycho

item.title: The Joy of Good Tools
item.description: I started out with a post on being willing to pay for GitHub. I ended up with a meditation on vocation and delight. It's quite the journey!
item.dc:creator: Chris Krycho
